title: Superpolator
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : Superpolator**

Superpolator is a piece of software created at [Letterror](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letterror) used to do advanced [interpolations](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/interpolation) with multiple inputs. Superpolation differs from standard interpolation algorithms which use only two sources for input. Superpolator is based on the [RoboFab](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/wiki/RoboFab) toolset.

URL: [http://www.letterror.com/code/superpolator/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/www.letterror.com/code/superpolator/ "http://www.letterror.com/code/superpolator/")

**Discussion:**  
 [Nodes in MM-fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131217083709/http:/typophile.com/node/39965)
author: filip blazek
